name: QUICKBOOKS__CUSTOMERS
description: Retrieve all customers from QuickBooks for customer relationship and invoice management tracking

fetchAll.description: Fetch all customers or use pagination

maxresults.description: Maximum number of customers to return

name: QUICKBOOKS__CREATE_CUSTOMER
description: Create new customers in QuickBooks for invoice and payment management tracking

CompanyName.description: Company name if different from customer name

name: QUICKBOOKS__INVOICES
description: Retrieve invoices from QuickBooks for accounts receivable management and revenue tracking analysis

fetchAll.description: Fetch all invoices or use pagination

maxresults.description: Maximum number of invoices to return

name: QUICKBOOKS__CREATE_INVOICE
description: Create invoices in QuickBooks for billing customers and managing accounts receivable workflows

name: QUICKBOOKS__UPDATE_INVOICE
description: Update existing invoices in QuickBooks for billing adjustments and payment status management

name: QUICKBOOKS__PAYMENTS
description: Retrieve payment records from QuickBooks for cash flow analysis and accounts receivable tracking

fetchAll.description: Fetch all payments or use pagination

maxresults.description: Maximum number of payments to return

name: QUICKBOOKS__CREATE_PAYMENT
description: Record payments in QuickBooks for invoice settlements and accounts receivable management

name: QUICKBOOKS__ITEMS
description: Retrieve products and services from QuickBooks for inventory management and invoice line items

fetchAll.description: Fetch all items or use pagination

maxresults.description: Maximum number of items to return

name: QUICKBOOKS__CREATE_ITEM
description: Create products and services in QuickBooks for inventory management and invoicing workflows

fetchAll.description: Fetch all expenses or use pagination

maxresults.description: Maximum number of expenses to return

name: QUICKBOOKS__CREATE_EXPENSE
description: Record expense transactions in QuickBooks for cost tracking and financial management workflows

name: QUICKBOOKS__ACCOUNTS

name: QUICKBOOKS__CREATE_ACCOUNT
description: Create new accounts in QuickBooks chart of accounts for financial categorization and reporting

name: QUICKBOOKS__VENDORS
description: Retrieve vendor information from QuickBooks for supplier management and accounts payable tracking

fetchAll.description: Fetch all vendors or use pagination

maxresults.description: Maximum number of vendors to return

name: QUICKBOOKS__CREATE_VENDOR
description: Create vendor records in QuickBooks for supplier management and accounts payable workflows

TaxIdentifier.description: Tax ID or SSN of vendor

name: QUICKBOOKS__ESTIMATES

name: QUICKBOOKS__CREATE_BILL
description: Create bills in QuickBooks for vendor invoice tracking and accounts payable management

name: QUICKBOOKS__EMPLOYEES
description: Retrieve employee information from QuickBooks for payroll management and HR administration

maxresults.description: Maximum number of employees to return

name: QUICKBOOKS__CREATE_EMPLOYEE
description: Create employee records in QuickBooks for payroll setup and HR management workflows

name: QUICKBOOKS__COMPANY_INFO
description: Retrieve company information and settings from QuickBooks for business configuration and reporting setup

name: QUICKBOOKS__TAX_AGENCIES
description: Retrieve tax agencies from QuickBooks for tax compliance and reporting management workflows

fetchAll.description: Fetch all tax agencies or use pagination

name: QUICKBOOKS__RUN_REPORT
description: Generate financial reports from QuickBooks for business intelligence, analytics, and regulatory compliance

report_name.description: Type of financial report to generate

summarize_column_by.description: How to summarize columns in report

name: QUICKBOOKS__TIME_ACTIVITIES
description: Retrieve time tracking activities from QuickBooks for project billing and employee hour management

fetchAll.description: Fetch all time activities or use pagination

maxresults.description: Maximum number of time activities to return

name: QUICKBOOKS__CREATE_TIME_ACTIVITY
description: Record time activities in QuickBooks for project tracking, employee hours, and billable time management

value.description: Customer ID this time is billed to

name: QUICKBOOKS__SEND_INVOICE
description: Send invoices via email to customers directly from QuickBooks for automated billing workflows

sendTo.description: Email address to send invoice to (optional - uses customer email if not specified)

name: QUICKBOOKS__PROFIT_AND_LOSS
description: Generate profit and loss statements from QuickBooks for financial performance analysis and reporting

name: QUICKBOOKS__BALANCE_SHEET
description: Generate balance sheet reports from QuickBooks for financial position analysis and asset tracking
